teams.name: HP
teams.loan_because:
This is a unique opportunity for HP employees globally to actively participate in driving HP Living Progress by supporting thousands of entrepreneurs around the world who need access to capital to start or grow their business. HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.

This is a unique opportunity for HP employees globally to actively participate in driving HP Living Progress by supporting thousands of entrepreneurs around the world who need access to capital to start or grow their business. HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

***TEAM RESOURCES***
Secular Loans
http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

Field Partners - Social and Secular Ratings:
www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

***OTHER RESOURCES:***
Starfish List:
http://starfish.dynalias.org/

KivaLens:
http://www.kivalens.org/

Toolkit for analyzing Kiva data:
http://build.kiva.org/

teams.name: DeutscheBank
teams.loan_because:
Each of us has the ability to help address poverty in a meaningful way and collectively we can positively impact social change.

Deutsche Bank has partnered with Kiva to provide US employees the opportunity to make loans to entrepreneurs of their choice. This capital will help borrowers improve their own lives and create sustainable income to support their families and their communities.

With full participation from our franchise, employees have the potential to impact more than 500,000 people in the developing world.
teams.description: For more than 20 years, Deutsche Bank has been a leader and trusted partner in the field of social finance. Leveraging its core capabilities as a global financial services firm, the Bank has financed opportunities to serve the poor ranging from affordable housing and microfinance to clean energy and healthcare. This collective work represents more than USD 2.5 billion in capital deployed. Deutsche Bank’s Global Social Investments group has relationships with over 120 microfinance institutions (MFIs) in 50 countries around the world. The Bank is committed to complying with laws prohibiting discrimination in lending.

teams.name: Kiva Muslims
teams.loan_because:
002.271 Yusuf Ali Translation:
If ye disclose (acts of) charity, even so it is well, but if ye conceal them, and make them reach those (really) in need, that is best for you: It will remove from you some of your (stains of) evil. And Allah is well acquainted with what ye do.
teams.description: Insha'Allah our team will be a collaboration of people from all walks of life united by one goal: to help those less fortunate and displaying great appreciation to our creator for blessing us to help make a differerence in the world.

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: DeutscheBank
teams.loan_because:
Each of us has the ability to help address poverty in a meaningful way and collectively we can positively impact social change.

Deutsche Bank has partnered with Kiva to provide US employees the opportunity to make loans to entrepreneurs of their choice. This capital will help borrowers improve their own lives and create sustainable income to support their families and their communities.

With full participation from our franchise, employees have the potential to impact more than 500,000 people in the developing world.
teams.description: For more than 20 years, Deutsche Bank has been a leader and trusted partner in the field of social finance. Leveraging its core capabilities as a global financial services firm, the Bank has financed opportunities to serve the poor ranging from affordable housing and microfinance to clean energy and healthcare. This collective work represents more than USD 2.5 billion in capital deployed. Deutsche Bank’s Global Social Investments group has relationships with over 120 microfinance institutions (MFIs) in 50 countries around the world. The Bank is committed to complying with laws prohibiting discrimination in lending.

HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: HRDQ
teams.loan_because: Our goal is to help individuals, teams, and organizations improve their lives through better work performance, and Kiva is an extension of that goal to small business owners in less fortunate countries around the world.
teams.description: Our team includes HRDQ employees, family and friends. Anyone who would like to join our team is welcome.

teams.name: DeutscheBank
teams.loan_because:
Each of us has the ability to help address poverty in a meaningful way and collectively we can positively impact social change.

Deutsche Bank has partnered with Kiva to provide US employees the opportunity to make loans to entrepreneurs of their choice. This capital will help borrowers improve their own lives and create sustainable income to support their families and their communities.

With full participation from our franchise, employees have the potential to impact more than 500,000 people in the developing world.
teams.description: For more than 20 years, Deutsche Bank has been a leader and trusted partner in the field of social finance. Leveraging its core capabilities as a global financial services firm, the Bank has financed opportunities to serve the poor ranging from affordable housing and microfinance to clean energy and healthcare. This collective work represents more than USD 2.5 billion in capital deployed. Deutsche Bank’s Global Social Investments group has relationships with over 120 microfinance institutions (MFIs) in 50 countries around the world. The Bank is committed to complying with laws prohibiting discrimination in lending.

teams.name: DNN Community
teams.loan_because: We want to empower individuals around the world with a specific focus on computing/internet related requests. Most of us are small business owners and we know how important local businesses are to economic development.
teams.description: We are individuals and (mostly small) businesses specialized in making solutions based on DNN Platform, an open source CMS. If you don't know what that means, don't worry: we make websites :-)

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: Team Githurai Community Projects.
teams.loan_because:
To ensure that people living in extreme poverty are able to meet their basic needs, achieve their rights and manage their developments.

“WE SEEK WAYS NOT JUST TO DO GOOD BUT ALSO RATHER TO HELP MANY OTHERS DO BETTER.”
teams.description:
We would like to change the world. We realize that it is a huge undertaking but we feel that our life has no purpose unless we leave a legacy of change, caring and commitment to the children, youth, women, men, families and the community at large. We whole Heartedly believe in giving back, helping the less fortunate and working hard for the betterment of our world community at large.

We love to travel and volunteer and plan on doing it more often. All of our greatest accomplishment and positive attributes are because of being productive members in the society where we live in and creating an enabling environment while continuously challenging ourselves. It's our responsibility to bring this into effect.  

 “INDIVIDUAL, WE ARE ONE DROP. TOGETHER, WE ARE AN OCEAN.”

Hey everyone...follow us on  Facebook page for "Githurai Community Projects" and want you to "like" the page and "join" our "Team Githurai Community Projects" on Kiva as well so you'll get up to date information. ﻿

Currently our website is under construction.

teams.name: Kiva Walk
teams.loan_because: Because we know the benefit of someone providing a 'hand up' both in our work and throughout our life.
teams.description: Founded by a 8.5 month walk across the USA in 2010, the KivaWalk Lending Team is a growing movement of Kiva champions that use walking to teach and instill Kiva's mission while also connecting us to the profound benefits of life at 3mph.

teams.name: City College of San Francisco
teams.loan_because: we are a diverse and culturally integrated campus that wants to improve the global standard of living. We believe that our collective efforts have the power to make a significant difference in peoples' lives!

teams.name: Zawadi by Youth
teams.description: Our team is composed of high school students with a common goal - to help. Our group started out small, but it grows larger and larger. We now have 30 students, and we have attained 501(c)3 status. To raise money, we have benefits which bring together our community in the spirit of giving. Please visit ZawadibyYouth.org or contact John Pizzi at jpizzi@riverdale.edu for more information.

teams.name: Charitable Innovations
teams.loan_because: We want to help entrepreneurs abroad, while helping the local community.
teams.description: We are a student run, non-profit, micro-finance corporation. We take money from local fundraisers, micro-lend the money, then transfer the ownership of the loans to a local charity. This allows us to help entrepreneurs abroad, while impacting the local community.

teams.name: JCI - Junior Chamber International
teams.loan_because: Junior Chamber International is a worldwide nonprofit organisation which provide development opportunities that empower young people to create positive change.
teams.description: This group is compose of Member, alumni or friends of JCI

teams.name: DoSomething
teams.loan_because: DoSomething.org is the country’s largest not-for-profit for young people and social change. We have 1,666,208 members (and counting) who kick ass on causes they care about. Bullying. Animal cruelty. Homelessness. Cancer. The list goes on. DoSomething.org spearheads national campaigns so 13- to 25-year-olds can make an impact - without ever needing money, an adult, or a car. Over 2.4 million people took action through DoSomething.org in 2012. Why? Because apathy sucks.

teams.name: Kiva U Schools
teams.whereabouts: High Schools Across the United States

teams.name: Kiva U Summit 2013
teams.loan_because: We were empowered by the Kiva U Summit

teams.name: Kiva U Colleges
teams.description:
Kiva U-College is an international network of microfinance clubs that gives university students an easy way to play a direct role in changing lives. Kiva U's mission is to educate students about the potential impact of microfinance, and to encourage microlending through Kiva's lending teams. 

Kiva U is world-wide and it continues to grow. In the coming school year, Kiva U will provide its chapters with the infrastructure and resources they need to establish a permanent presence on campus. The program will offer its chapters a variety of opportunities to participate in competitions and conferences, and will strongly encourage intra-university collaboration.

teams.name: Powerful Women
teams.loan_because: Micro financing was founded by Muhammad Yunus with the goal to empower women around the globe. We want to contribute to that goal in any way we can.
teams.description: Powerful Women is a team of both women and men in support of financing women all over the world so that they can provide a better standard of living for their family, community, and future.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: HELPING HANDS INTERNATIONAL
teams.loan_because: the best actions one can do is gladden the hearts of other human beings, feed the hungry, help the afflicted, lighten the sorrow of the sorrowful and remove the sufferings of the injured.
teams.description: HELPING HANDS INTERNATIONAL consists of people who makes giving a way of life, so others can have a better way of living.

teams.name: Startup Founders - every individual and business has the power to make a difference
teams.loan_because: We all need to work together to make the world a better place.
teams.description: Startup Founders supporting fellow entrepreneurs thru microfinance to grow their businesses and make their lives and their world a better place

HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: DeutscheBank
teams.loan_because:
Each of us has the ability to help address poverty in a meaningful way and collectively we can positively impact social change.

Deutsche Bank has partnered with Kiva to provide US employees the opportunity to make loans to entrepreneurs of their choice. This capital will help borrowers improve their own lives and create sustainable income to support their families and their communities.

With full participation from our franchise, employees have the potential to impact more than 500,000 people in the developing world.
teams.description: For more than 20 years, Deutsche Bank has been a leader and trusted partner in the field of social finance. Leveraging its core capabilities as a global financial services firm, the Bank has financed opportunities to serve the poor ranging from affordable housing and microfinance to clean energy and healthcare. This collective work represents more than USD 2.5 billion in capital deployed. Deutsche Bank’s Global Social Investments group has relationships with over 120 microfinance institutions (MFIs) in 50 countries around the world. The Bank is committed to complying with laws prohibiting discrimination in lending.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

Leveraging its core capabilities as a global financial services firm, the Bank has financed opportunities to serve the poor ranging from affordable housing and microfinance to clean energy and healthcare. This collective work represents more than USD 2.5 billion in capital deployed. Deutsche Bank’s Global Social Investments group has relationships with over 120 microfinance institutions (MFIs) in 50 countries around the world. The Bank is committed to complying with laws prohibiting discrimination in lending.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

Secular Loans

www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: DeutscheBank
teams.loan_because:
Each of us has the ability to help address poverty in a meaningful way and collectively we can positively impact social change.

Deutsche Bank has partnered with Kiva to provide US employees the opportunity to make loans to entrepreneurs of their choice. This capital will help borrowers improve their own lives and create sustainable income to support their families and their communities.

With full participation from our franchise, employees have the potential to impact more than 500,000 people in the developing world.
teams.description: For more than 20 years, Deutsche Bank has been a leader and trusted partner in the field of social finance. Leveraging its core capabilities as a global financial services firm, the Bank has financed opportunities to serve the poor ranging from affordable housing and microfinance to clean energy and healthcare. This collective work represents more than USD 2.5 billion in capital deployed. Deutsche Bank’s Global Social Investments group has relationships with over 120 microfinance institutions (MFIs) in 50 countries around the world. The Bank is committed to complying with laws prohibiting discrimination in lending.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

http://starfish.dynalias.org/

KivaLens:
http://www.kivalens.org/

Toolkit for analyzing Kiva data:
http://build.kiva.org/

teams.name: Kiva Buddhists
teams.loan_because: We water seeds of awakening.
teams.description: We are Buddhists of all variety, but focus here is on the way of the Boddhisatva.

teams.name: Unitarian Universalists
teams.loan_because:
We believe in:
**The inherent worth and dignity of every person
**Justice, equity and compassion in human relations
**Acceptance of one another and encouragement to spiritual growth in our congregations
**A free and responsible search for truth and meaning
**The right of conscience and the use of the democratic process within our congregations and in society at large
**The goal of world community with peace, liberty, and justice for all
**Respect for the interdependent web of all existence of which we are a part.
teams.description:
We are UU congregations and individuals (including those who describe themselves as "active" or "backslid" or "interested friends" or "just looking") throughout the world. 
For more information on us, or to find a congregation near you, check out the main website for the Unitarian Universalist Association

teams.name: HP

teams.name: DeutscheBank

teams.name: Ian Martin Group
teams.loan_because:
We see a world with each and every person pursuing meaningful work.

So in 2014, we are "Redeeming the Resume Black Hole" by asking all 100,000+ people who apply to jobs through the Ian Martin Group, to use our funds to make a loan on Kiva!

http://ianmartin.com/blog/2014/01/redeeming-the-resume-black-hole/

Check out our progress here: http://www.kiva.org/team/ianmartin/goals
teams.description:
Founded in 1957, the Ian Martin Group is North America's most progressive recruitment and project-staffing firm.  As a Certified B Corporation, we meet comprehensive standards that measure our impact on employees, suppliers, community, and the environment. Our guiding statement is: “building authentic connections around meaningful work.”
 
The Ian Martin family includes technical recruitment divisions IME, IMT and IMIT – experts in Engineering, Telecom and IT respectively. The 500 Staffing is best understood as 'not so’ General Staffing and Ian Martin Executive which focuses on providing exceptional business leadership to technical and scientific centered organizations. 

http://ianmartin.com
http://ianmartin.com/blog
https://twitter.com/IanMartinGroup
https://facebook.com/IanMartinGroup
http://bcorporation.net/ianmartingroup

teams.name: DeutscheBank
teams.loan_because:
Each of us has the ability to help address poverty in a meaningful way and collectively we can positively impact social change.

Deutsche Bank has partnered with Kiva to provide US employees the opportunity to make loans to entrepreneurs of their choice. This capital will help borrowers improve their own lives and create sustainable income to support their families and their communities.

With full participation from our franchise, employees have the potential to impact more than 500,000 people in the developing world.
teams.description: For more than 20 years, Deutsche Bank has been a leader and trusted partner in the field of social finance. Leveraging its core capabilities as a global financial services firm, the Bank has financed opportunities to serve the poor ranging from affordable housing and microfinance to clean energy and healthcare. This collective work represents more than USD 2.5 billion in capital deployed. Deutsche Bank’s Global Social Investments group has relationships with over 120 microfinance institutions (MFIs) in 50 countries around the world. The Bank is committed to complying with laws prohibiting discrimination in lending.

teams.name: Guys holding fish
teams.loan_because: We feel an affinity for entrepreneurs that make their living by fishing, selling fish, or attempting to make their lives better because of their proximity to the ocean, or freshwater locales...
teams.description:
We love fish and/or fishing so much that many of us have chosen to present ourselves on KIVA with a photo of ourselves, holding a fish!  We welcome "gals" to join, as well, the name of the team notwithstanding...  

We certainly support "sustainable" fishing, but also recognize that sometimes, our "Western" views of resource management may not match the needs of the very desperate folks, in other countries, struggling to make a living, or even providing food for their families ...  Our intent is to help the struggling, without regard to their profession or trade.  We believe that our lending record well represents that goal, as we are a pretty diverse group, with very diverse lending interests....

Each of us has the ability to help address poverty in a meaningful way and collectively we can positively impact social change.

Deutsche Bank has partnered with Kiva to provide US employees the opportunity to make loans to entrepreneurs of their choice. This capital will help borrowers improve their own lives and create sustainable income to support their families and their communities.

With full participation from our franchise, employees have the potential to impact more than 500,000 people in the developing world.
teams.description: For more than 20 years, Deutsche Bank has been a leader and trusted partner in the field of social finance. Leveraging its core capabilities as a global financial services firm, the Bank has financed opportunities to serve the poor ranging from affordable housing and microfinance to clean energy and healthcare. This collective work represents more than USD 2.5 billion in capital deployed. Deutsche Bank’s Global Social Investments group has relationships with over 120 microfinance institutions (MFIs) in 50 countries around the world. The Bank is committed to complying with laws prohibiting discrimination in lending.

teams.name: HP
teams.loan_because:
This is a unique opportunity for HP employees globally to actively participate in driving HP Living Progress by supporting thousands of entrepreneurs around the world who need access to capital to start or grow their business. HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster
teams.loan_because:
"Thou shalt share, that none may seek without funding."   A nod to VII.  of “RANDOM NUMBER OF NOT COMMANDMENTS, SUGGESTIONS"  in the LOOSE CANON:
http://www.loose-canon.info/page17.htm
teams.description:
Members of the Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster  

Secular vs religious Field Partners, see links at http://atheist-monkey.blogspot.de/2009/08/kiva-mfi-checker.html

For Kiva tips and who knows what the FSM will move us to add for mutual benefit & merriment:  
http://flyingspaghettikivans.blogspot.it/    

and
  https://www.facebook.com/pages/FlyingSpaghettiKivans

teams.name: ONE LRAS
teams.loan_because: We want to shift the entire world's LRAS together!
teams.description: Economically minded individuals trying to make the world better at the margins.

teams.name: Guys holding fish
teams.loan_because: We feel an affinity for entrepreneurs that make their living by fishing, selling fish, or attempting to make their lives better because of their proximity to the ocean, or freshwater locales...
teams.description:
We love fish and/or fishing so much that many of us have chosen to present ourselves on KIVA with a photo of ourselves, holding a fish!  We welcome "gals" to join, as well, the name of the team notwithstanding...  

We certainly support "sustainable" fishing, but also recognize that sometimes, our "Western" views of resource management may not match the needs of the very desperate folks, in other countries, struggling to make a living, or even providing food for their families ...  Our intent is to help the struggling, without regard to their profession or trade.  We believe that our lending record well represents that goal, as we are a pretty diverse group, with very diverse lending interests....

teams.name: HP
teams.loan_because:
This is a unique opportunity for HP employees globally to actively participate in driving HP Living Progress by supporting thousands of entrepreneurs around the world who need access to capital to start or grow their business. HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. It’s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: DeutscheBank
teams.loan_because:
Each of us has the ability to help address poverty in a meaningful way and collectively we can positively impact social change.

Deutsche Bank has partnered with Kiva to provide US employees the opportunity to make loans to entrepreneurs of their choice. This capital will help borrowers improve their own lives and create sustainable income to support their families and their communities.

With full participation from our franchise, employees have the potential to impact more than 500,000 people in the developing world.
teams.description: For more than 20 years, Deutsche Bank has been a leader and trusted partner in the field of social finance. Leveraging its core capabilities as a global financial services firm, the Bank has financed opportunities to serve the poor ranging from affordable housing and microfinance to clean energy and healthcare. This collective work represents more than USD 2.5 billion in capital deployed. Deutsche Bank’s Global Social Investments group has relationships with over 120 microfinance institutions (MFIs) in 50 countries around the world. The Bank is committed to complying with laws prohibiting discrimination in lending.

teams.description: This lending team replaces the donations made to Video DownloadHelper authors to sustain the development of this free software.
